ch.nolix.element.color

Class ColorGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity.Entity
      • ch.nolix.element.core.Element
        • ch.nolix.element.color.ColorGradient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Typed, TypeRequestable, Specified
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundColorGradient

    public class ColorGradient
extends Element
    A color gradient specifies two colors and an uni direction. A color gradient is not mutable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
